amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the enacting clause and inserts findings and a sense of Congress that the SEC is required to conduct economic analysis as part of its rulemaking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-60 to strike all after the enacting clause and inserts findings and a sense of Congress that the SEC is required to conduct economic analysis as part of its rulemaking.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 233 (Roll no. 158).
